item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

Option 1: Use same objects (hay,dummy,door) They all give exp

Option 2: Use this TUT http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,77119.0.html

Optional: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,74049.0.html[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 05:55:09 AM[/size][hr]OH btw, did you change you name from spoon to sp00n
If you did, how lol ?
I want to change my lame name
